b1.text: You authorize Infinity to withdraw You authorize Infinity to withdraw the amount of any requested wire transfer that you authorize and instruct via Infinity website, plus any applicable fees and charges from your designated account at Infinity . Each wire transfer requested by you shall be binding on you and Infinity shall have no liability or other obligation for any unauthorized wire transfer.
